body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer, attorney, and politician. Virginia native. Married to Matlida Mallory. Father of Elizabeth Mallory, Robert Mallory, Jr., Matilda Mallory, and Fannie Mallory. Attended the University of Virginia. Studied law and admitted to the bar in 1837. Attorney in New Castle, Kentucky. Member of the House of Representatives of the United States, representing the Fifth and Seventh Congressional Districts of Kentucky, from 1859 to 1865. Delegate to the 1866 Union National Convention at Philadelphia.
